FAQ:

What payments methods do you accept?
Credit Card - VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, VISA/MC debit cards.
Paypal - VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, VISA/MC debit cards, bank transfer, eCheck, Paypal balance.

Is there a Speed Test Download File?
Yes! http://www.turnkeyinternet.net/50mbtestfile.bin

How soon will my account be ready?
All new orders are subject to approval by our billing department and may require additional details to process your order. Accounts are ready within 24 hours once approved by the billing department.

Any Content Restrictions?
Please see our terms of service for complete details at: http://www.turnkeyinternet.net/doc/TermsOfService.php No bulk email services, no proxies, no warez/linking. Legal Adult content permitted on Dedicated servers only.

How are your prices so low?
We own and operate our own facility, servers, routers, and network connections. We are not resellers, or wholesalers - and thus we do not have the higher operating costs of renting servers and equipment which allows us to pass down the savings to our customers.

Where are the servers located?
These specials are available in our New York, US datacenter.

Do you have a money back guarantee?
Yes, a 30 day no questions asked money back is available to all new customers.

Why Host with TurnKey Internet?
TurnKey Internet provides superior hosting performance at affordable prices, backed with bulletproof reliability and a 100% network uptime guarantee. Fully managed services provide you with peace of mind with off site backups, firewall setup, and 24 x 7 system administration support. TurnKey Internet is a member of the Better Business Bureau of New York, with the highest possible rating of A+.

CONTACT US:
Live Chat: Live Sales Chat
Email: sales@turnkeyinternet.net
Web: www.turnkeyinternet.net

* Clients must be in good standing and active for 61 days in order to qualify for the gift card. The gift card will be sent within 6 to 8 weeks. Limit one per account. See full details at http://www.turnkeyinternet.net/cashback.
